Pre-Game Insights: Denver Nuggets are on a 3-game win streak entering the matchup against the Miami Heat.
Denver Nuggets finished 57-25 overall last season with a strong home record.
Miami Heat finished 46-36 overall last season with a decent road record.
Both teams have injury concerns heading into the game.
Others: Injuries for both teams are mentioned, including Vlatko Cancar, Jamal Murray, Aaron Gordon for the Nuggets and Kevin Love, Jaime Jaquez Jr. for the Heat.
